name: Wilbur RICHARDSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, et al., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Richardson v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Wilbur RICHARDSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, et al., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
838 A.2d 650
Wilbur RICHARDSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, et al., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2003.
